name: OxAI.com
description: The dawn of the AI era is upon us. The OxAI Web3 Infrastructure Protocol unlocks Decentralized AI Computation for any human or machine in the world, without compromising data privacy or security. The OxAI Bot puts AI-powered insights in the palm of your hands to augment your intelligence and empower you to make smarter, more informed decisions with the AI Suite. AI has the potential to add up to $13 trillion to global GDP and create up to 133 million new jobs by 2030. We are inspired by the great potential of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and how it can revolutionize the way we live, work, and play. OxAI brings together the best of AI and blockchain technology and is built on the principles of decentralization and inclusivity, with a platform that offers powerful AI-based services, lowers the barriers to entry and makes AI accessible to anyone and everyone.
